content: **knitted jumper in 4 strands drops kid-silk piece is knitted top down with european / diagonal shoulder size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ks-229 yarn group a + a + a + a or e ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 75-100-100-125-125-125 g colour 01 off white 75-100-100-125-125-125 g colour 03 light pink 75-100-100-125-125-125 g colour 13 pink 75-100-100-125-125-125 g colour 52 lemonade **needles** drops circular needle size 6 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 13 stitches in width and 17 row vertically in stocking stitch and 4 strands on needle size 6 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles ---------------------------------------------
